timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
NF: Decrement moved to decrementCount

This allow in future commit to precompute the next card without
changing the count; the counts being changed only when getCard
actually return a card.

This would also avoid the code duplication of
```
card.getLeft() / 1000;
```
Except that instead we get comment duplication.
